description: Try our easy to follow Bbq Barramundi With Mixed Grain Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ fish,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Easter leftovers,Barramundi,Fish,Christmas,Wheat free,Rice,Dairy free
name: Bbq Barramundi With Mixed Grain Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g can lentils no added salt, drained

recipeInstructions.text: Combine rice, quinoa and lentils in a large bowl. Add currants, herbs, spring onion and pomegranate seeds, if using. Whisk oil and lemon juice together. Add to rice mix and toss to combine. Set aside.
Preheat barbecue plate on medium high. Brush barramundi fillets with extra oil and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 3 minutes each side or until just cooked through.
Add nuts to salad and transfer to a platter. Top with fish and serve with slices of lemon.
